text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she darts across the turf, golden<n>hair ablaze in the
sunset, Gold City's<n>face is the picture of determination.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: And... done! Pant, pant... My time!What's my time?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Really? ...Wow, it actually is. I... I did it!
choice_data_list: Simply amazing. They grow up so fast. Sniffle.
Simply amazing. They grow up so fast. Sniffle.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ugh, do you have to be so extra allthe time? But yeah... I guess I amamazing!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer. You're over the top, andannoying, and tactless, and youreally piss me off sometimes...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But you know, being a trainer really<n>fits you. Maybe it's
like, your calling,<n>or whatever.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you better not let that get to your<n>head, though. You
haven't earned my<n>full approval yet.
choice_data_list:
I'll do my utmost to live up to your every
expectation!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: That there is exactly what I'mtalking about! Ahaha! All right, time tohit up the gym for the rest of theevening. It's leg day after all...

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text: City!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh? Manager? What are you doing<n>here?

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
Sorry to interrupt practice, but it's an<n>emergency! This could
be your big<n>break!

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, Trainer! I'm going to have<n>to cut practice short
today!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Wha—Who made you boss?We've still got tons to work on!

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text: Please, just hear me out. This will<n>affect your future!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: My future?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
So, turns out, I was just a substitute.<n>Some hotshot model
canceled last<n>minute, so I was called to fill in.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I got the job done, obviously. I<n>always give one
hundred-percent, no<n>matter what.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But then my manager said I gave a<n>"safe and bland
performance."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Sure, it was a pretty big deal, even if I<n>was just a sub. My
big chance to get<n>noticed by all these superstar names.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I get where she's coming from, but<n>like, can she not take
away from my<n>training time? And get this—

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
She's like, "Ever since you started<n>hanging around that
trainer, you've<n>been losing sight of your priorities as<n>a
model."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Like, I'm sorry, what?! Anyway, it got<n>ugly. Ugh, what a
disaster.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I mean, I know she's right. I haven't<n>been as focused on
work. Hard to<n>care about poses when all I can think<n>about
is running.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Thing is, I promised to keep modeling<n>so she'd let me enroll
here. Managed<n>to convince her I could do both.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But now that I'm actually getting<n>serious about racing, well...
Not exactly<n>what I hoped for.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I really thought I could run two roads<n>at once, but guess I
just don't have<n>that kind of agility.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She falls silent, but her brooding<n>expression tells me her
thoughts are<n>still racing.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Say, Trainer... You somehow knew I'd<n>make a decent
runner, didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You knew I wasn't just some pretty<n>doll—that I could win
out there on the<n>turf... And you still believe that, right?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Yeah? Hah... Okay, I've decided.<n>Honestly don't know why
I didn't do<n>this earlier.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
What are you imagining? Relax, geez.<n>If anything, it might be
good news for<n>you. Because I...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Am going to quit modeling!
